contents.contents: At the onset of the opening of the campus for the FLEX modality of blended learning (HISFlex), a campus pin landmark will welcome the students to serve as a pop-up SAMAHAN assistance booth. Physical copies of the SAMAHAN Safe Return to Campus kits will also be given to students upon request.

Together, WeCreate SAMAHAN as we execute and concretize our collective goal to serve communities beyond Ateneo. This year, every Atenean is empowered to empower as you join us as dreamers and doers of your own passion projects. WeCreate SAMAHAN is a capacity-building camp that will help Sui Generis leaders craft their own initiatives para sa bayan!

Funded by the Office of the Treasurerâ€™s AdDU to Cart, this year, The Paper Boat Project will once again visit public schools and communities to share with our Mindanaoan children the power and beauty of reading. Through reading and storytelling, our goal is to expose them to limitless possibilities so they will fashion a vision of their own future.
